info.id: TR HT70246: Fix for MR-37637 cyclic reboot issue - Delete bin file in FmStatusSection - Make sure system is still OK after com restart
info.description: TR HT70246: Fix for MR-37637 cyclic reboot issue - Delete bin file in FmStatusSection - Make sure system is still OK after com restart

config.searchPattern: 'safSu=Cmw[1-2],safSg=2N,safApp=ERIC-ComSa' Presence State INSTANTIATED => RESTARTING\|'safSu=Cmw1,safSg=2N,safApp=ERIC-ComSa' Presence State INSTANTIATED => TERMINATING
